channel.title: Cinematic mod
channel.description:
hey guys, does anyone know where i can download half-life 2 cinematic mod lite? i cant find it anywhere, and rapidshare just wont load on my pc.
thanks :slight_smile:

item.title: Cinematic mod
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
Yeah I had it on for a few months and played most of HL2. Some areas were great, the use of Ep2 trees and some high res textures was especially well done, but then some areas were crap with too much added in to the levels. Uninstalled it recently and got 12GB of space back =D

Read full topic

item.title: Cinematic mod
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
The worlds don;t even look that good sometimes imho, he ruins the feel. VALVe originals are best, with some of his early character textures, and environment textures.

Once he started fucking with models, he went shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Cinematic mod
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Bmsmg:

You can go through the main site. Click cinematic mod ten. Scroll down enough an you will see FTP or Torrent downloads. The FTP server is shit, however, you can get it through the torrent location. Click on the torrent download, on the page it leads you to there should be a “Get it through your browser with BitLet” link. Just follow it, and you will eventually be downloading on a high quality server with pause/resume support, even if you shut off your computer.

That’s how I got it, leastways.

Cinematic mod is NOT shit. Not by a long shot.

World looks pretty, characters look like shit.

Read full topic
